titles.title: DeckSure, Waterproof, Slip Resistant
titles.premium: WATER BASED | Low VOC | Long-term Protection | Waterproof | Stain + Seal
titles.title2: Heavy-duty resurfacing coating for damaged wood decks.

product_overview: Heavy-duty resurfacing coating for damaged wood decks.
short_description: Repairs cracks, seals splinters, and protects surfaces.
positioning: DeckSure resurfaces worn timber, filling cracks and sealing decks against weather and wear.

features_benefits.benefit: Adheres firmly to deck surfaces to prevent peeling
Seals timber against rain and weather exposure
Textured finish improves safety on wet decks
Protects decks from fungal growth and decay
Fills cracks, seals splinters, and extends deck life

recommended_use.intro: Specially designed for exterior wooden decks exposed to weather and foot traffic.

application_system.label: Prepare Surface
application_system.purpose: Light sanding recommended before application to improve adhesion

application_system.label: First Coat
application_system.purpose: Apply evenly with pad, roller, or brush

application_system.label: Second Coat
application_system.purpose: Recoat after 6 hours for maximum durability

technical_data.Binder Type: Acrylic wood stain with weather-grade binder

surface_preparation: Ensure surface is clean and dry
Light sanding recommended for worn or untreated decks
Remove all dirt, dust, and contaminants
application: Apply with pad, roller, or brush

limitations.Not Recommended For: Non-wood substrates or polished timber flooring

storage_safety: Do not expose to open flame

safety_first_aid.Inhalation: Avoid inhaling vapours; wear mask if spraying
safety_first_aid.Fire Safety: Do not use near open flame

environmental_commitment: Eco-friendly water-based formula ensures long-term deck protection with low environmental impact.

specs_summary.application_instructions: Use pad, roller, or brush. Best applied in 2 coats on clean, sanded deck surfaces.
specs_summary.safety_precautions: Do not use near open flames; wear PPE when handling
